Resource.item:
From this page you can create a new questionnaire.
You can find in the detail some default sections you could choose to save your data in.

or QUESTIONNAIRE DETAILS
In the first section you can enter
- the questionnaire name,
- an eventual description of the questionnaire (goals, recipients, etc.)
- the choosen language
- the time span the questionnaire is active in. A start date and an end date are displayed.
- indicates if the questionnaire is blocked or not. A blocked questionnaire can not be complied.

or METHODS OF ADMINISTRATION
In the second section you can set
- The maximum time span (minutes) to compile the questionnaire. If any time limitation is expected, enter a value equal to zero
- the quiz rating scale, that is the maximum score an user can reach by answering correctly to all answers
- set the anonymous compilation of the quiz.
- Further options, allow the user to view or modify the given answers after the questionnaire compilation.

or QUESTIONNAIRE DETAILS
In the third section you can set the questionnaire recipients, that is the kind of users that are allowed to compile the questionnaire.
1) All the users of the community in which you created the questionnaire
2) Also users from outside the community, but still registered in comunità online
3) External users, you can invite by email using “invitation management”
4) All the users, also unregistered. In this case the questionnaire will be available on the portal homepage
